results.title: Simvastatin and Benznidazole-Mediated Prevention of Trypanosoma cruzi-Induced Endothelial Activation: Role of 15-epi-lipoxin A4 in the Action of Simvastatin
results.text_hl: Thus, we provide the bases that support the future use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in the treatment of cardiac @<m>DISEASE_Chagas_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014355 @@@Chagas disease@@@.

results.title: Short-term therapy with simvastatin reduces inflammatory mediators and heart inflammation during the acute phase of experimental Chagas disease.
results.text_hl: Short-term therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduces @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ mediators and @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@heart inflammation@@@ during the acute phase of experimental @<m>DISEASE_Chagas_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014355 @@@Chagas disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Silva RR, Shrestha-Bajracharya D, Almeida-Leite CM, Leite R, Bahia MT, Talvani A. Short-term therapy with simvastatin reduces inflammatory mediators and heart inflammation during the acute phase of experimental Chagas disease. Mem Inst Oswaldo Cruz. 2012 Jun;107(4):513-21. PMID: 22666863

results.title: Simvastatin Attenuates Endothelial Activation through 15-Epi-Lipoxin A4 Production in Murine Chronic Chagas Cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: However, when this drug was administered to @GENE_ALOX5 @GENE_11689 @@@5-lipoxygenase@@@-deficient @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, the anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ effect was not observed unless exogenous @CHEMICAL_lipoxin_A4 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C040527 @@@15-epi-lipoxin A4@@@ was administered. Thus, in @<m>DISEASE_Chagas_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014355 @@@chronic Chagas disease@@@, 5-epi-lipoxin A4 induced by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment could improve the pathophysiological condition of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ by increasing the trypanocidal action of @CHEMICAL_benzonidazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:C009999 @@@benznidazole@@@.

citations.NLM: González-Herrera F, Cramer A, Pimentel P, Castillo C, Liempi A, Kemmerling U, Machado FS, Maya JD. Simvastatin Attenuates Endothelial Activation through 15-Epi-Lipoxin A4 Production in Murine Chronic Chagas Cardiomyopathy. Antimicrob Agents Chemother. 2017 Mar;61(3):. PMID: 27993857
